message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to your business. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further and finding a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to offer $1,100,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider my initial offer and for countering. I understand your budget constraints, however, I believe the value this product brings to the table is significantly higher than your current offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on  $1,250,000?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I've reviewed your proposal carefully, and while I respect the value of the product, I am still aiming to stay within my budget. I am willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
